title: Globalization and the Modern World Economy

vocab.definition: Process of increased interconnectedness between countries and peoples
Company that operates in multiple countries
International commerce with minimal government restrictions
Sharing of ideas, customs, and practices between cultures
Mutual reliance between countries or regions

teachingNotes: Discuss both benefits and challenges of globalization. Connect to students' daily experiences with global products and culture.
